body.name: Gameboy Retro Handheld Game Console Handheld Games for Kids GameTendo - Over 400 Nostalgic Games Video Games Support 2 Players Play on TV(Pink)

features: 【TinyTendo Handheld Console】: Immerse yourself in the nostalgic world of gaming with the Retro Handheld Game Console. This compact device offers over 400 classic games, allowing you to relive your favorite gaming moments wherever you go.

【Expansive Game Collection】: With an extensive range of arcade favorites, including sports, puzzles, arcades, shooters, action, racing, fighting, and adventure games, the Portable Game Console ensures there's something for everyone to enjoy and explore. Rediscover the joy of retro gaming with this diverse selection.

【Uninterrupted Gaming Sessions】: Equipped with a rechargeable lithium battery and a USB cable, the TinyTendo Handheld Console provides 5-6 hours of continuous gameplay. Whether you're on a long trip or simply relaxing at home, this portable game console ensures uninterrupted gaming sessions.

【Add-On Two-Player Mode】: Take your gaming experience to the next level with the TinyTendo Handheld Console. The package includes an extra game controller, allowing two people to play games simultaneously. Connect the console to your TV using the AV output cable for a captivating big-screen experience.

【Ideal Memorable Gift】: Looking for the perfect gift? Look no further than the TinyTendo Handheld Console. Whether it's for children or adults, this retro gaming console is an ideal present during holidays, especially Christmas. Witness the joy on their faces as they engage in hours of exhilarating fun, either on the go or hooked up to a TV.
!!!!!Do not use fast chargers for charging!!!!! The main image is for aesthetic purposes only and has nothing to do with the actual games of the product.
body.description: The TinyTendo Handheld Console is the ultimate device for all gaming enthusiasts. With over 400 classic games, this compact console allows you to immerse yourself in the nostalgic world of retro gaming wherever you go. From sports to puzzles, arcades to shooters, action to racing, fighting to adventure games, the Portable Game Console offers an expansive collection that caters to every gaming preference.Equipped with a rechargeable lithium battery and a USB cable, the TinyTendo Handheld Console ensures uninterrupted gaming sessions with 5-6 hours of continuous gameplay. Whether you're on a long trip or simply relaxing at home, this portable game console will keep you entertained.But that's not all! The TinyTendo Handheld Console also comes with an extra game controller, allowing two people to play games together. Connect the console to your TV using the AV output cable for a captivating big-screen experience.Looking for the perfect gift? The TinyTendo Handheld Console is an ideal present for both children and adults, making it the perfect choice for birthdays, holidays, and especially Christmas. Witness the joy on their faces as they engage in hours of exhilarating fun, either on the go or hooked up to a TV. Don't miss out on the opportunity to relive your favorite gaming moments and create new ones with the TinyTendo Handheld Console. Order now and embark on a nostalgia-filled gaming adventure!

productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 11 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Had to order more
reviews.reviewText: Got one for when grandkids come to visit. 9 year old WOWED. Had to share with brother. Kids were glued to it. Didn’t have the heart to take it away, so I have to order two more. Loaded with so many of the original games that were new to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Game-boy, Love It!
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my son and myself ;) Love the old video games from my youth, so I thought I'd expose my kids to them and see how they handle it compared to the new ones. Surprisingly, my son loves it; I guess the modern ones are a bit too much, and the simplicity of the classics provides a calming experience for quality time together. Great battery life and a lid screen, which I love!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Battery is bad after one use
reviews.reviewText: This was great for one or two uses and now it won't hold a charge or work for more than 30 seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good console if you miss retro games.
reviews.reviewText: Loved the console. Comes with lots of retro games. Also working as expected when connected to the tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 1. The GameTendo handheld console exceeded my expectations with its extensive library of over 400 nostalgic games, providing endless entertainment for both kids and adults.2. The two-player support and the option to play on TV add a delightful social dimension to gaming, making it a fantastic choice for family fun.3. The retro charm and reliable performance make the GameTendo a must-have for gaming enthusiasts seeking a trip down memory lane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Oh my! This thing has so many games!!! Not only the most famous ones (Mario or Pac-Man) but you have chip and dale, Aladdin etc it brought me back to my childhood! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024

reviews.reviewText: This i feel like is way better then the modern game counsels. All games built in and games i played as a child.
